name: CyberRunner - FREE EDITION
description:
Made within 12 hours as part of a gamedev challenge between Simmering Studios (me) and DeepFriedOreo. 

Game Description: Run your way through the rooftops of a cyberpunk city, dodging deadly lasers, collecting XP, and purchasing helpful upgrades. Strategically place your platforms for each run, building the most efficient course you can. Can you outrun the approaching laser wall before it incinerates you?
